statements: SELECT * FROM digital_assets WHERE asset_type = 'image';
SELECT asset_id, asset_name FROM digital_assets WHERE asset_size > 1000;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_type FROM digital_assets ORDER BY asset_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM digital_assets WHERE asset_size < 500 AND asset_type = 'video';
SELECT asset_id, asset_size FROM digital_assets WHERE blockchain_transaction_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM digital_assets WHERE asset_type = 'image' AND asset_size > 1024 ORDER BY asset_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT asset_name, asset_size FROM digital_assets WHERE asset_type = 'video' ORDER BY asset_size DESC;
SELECT asset_name AS name, asset_type AS type, asset_size AS size FROM digital_assets WHERE asset_name ILIKE 'logo%' AND asset_size < 500 ORDER BY asset_size ASC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, blockchain_transaction_id FROM digital_assets WHERE blockchain_transaction_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY asset_id ASC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, uuid_generate_v4() AS new_uuid FROM digital_assets;
SELECT * FROM music_assets;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, artist_name FROM artwork_assets;
SELECT asset_name, artist_name, genre FROM music_assets WHERE genre = 'Pop';
SELECT * FROM music_assets ORDER BY artist_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT artist_name FROM artwork_assets;
SELECT * FROM music_assets WHERE genre = 'Pop' AND artist_name = 'Taylor Swift' ORDER BY asset_name ASC;
SELECT asset_name, artist_name FROM artwork_assets WHERE medium = 'Oil Painting' ORDER BY artist_name DESC;
SELECT asset_name, artist_name, genre FROM music_assets WHERE genre = 'Rock' OR genre = 'Metal' ORDER BY genre, asset_name DESC;
SELECT asset_name, artist_name FROM music_assets WHERE artist_name LIKE 'B%' AND genre != 'Rap' ORDER BY artist_name, asset_name ASC;
SELECT asset_name, artist_name, blockchain_transaction_id FROM artwork_assets WHERE medium = 'Digital Art' ORDER BY blockchain_transaction_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM DigitalAssets;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_type FROM DigitalAssets ORDER BY asset_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM AssetOwners WHERE owner_name = 'Alice';
SELECT asset_id, asset_type, asset_description FROM DigitalAssets WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT owner_name, owner_email FROM AssetOwners ORDER BY owner_name;
SELECT * FROM DigitalAssets;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_type FROM DigitalAssets WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT owner_name, owner_email, owner_address FROM AssetOwners WHERE owner_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM DigitalAssets ORDER BY asset_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, blockchain_transaction_id FROM DigitalASsets WHERE asset_type = 'NFT';
SELECT * FROM music_files LIMIT 10;
SELECT file_name, artist_name, upload_date FROM music_files WHERE artist_name = 'Bob Dylan';
SELECT id, file_type FROM music_files WHERE duration > 300;
SELECT * FROM artwork WHERE creation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT artwork_name, medium, size FROM artwork ORDER BY size DESC, creation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM music_files WHERE artist_name = 'Adele';
SELECT file_name, file_type FROM music_files WHERE duration > 300;
SELECT artist_name, MAX(duration) AS longest_duration FROM music_files GROUP BY artist_name;
SELECT * FROM artwork WHERE medium = 'Oil Painting' ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE proof_of_ownership = TRUE ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM digital_assets;
SELECT asset_name, artist_name FROM digital_assets WHERE asset_type = 'Music';
SELECT asset_name, upload_date FROM digital_assets ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT asset_name, artist_name, upload_date FROM digital_assets WHERE artist_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT transaction_id, tx_date FROM transactions WHERE from_owner_id = 1 AND to_owner_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM digital_assets;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, artist_name FROM digital_assets WHERE asset_type = 'Painting';
SELECT artist_name, COUNT(*) AS num_assets FROM digital_assets GROUP BY artist_name ORDER BY num_assets DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT(owner_name) AS unique_owners FROM asset_owners WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE tx_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY tx_date DESC;
